channel.title: Mother
channel.description:
I love my mom but strongly dislike her she is always doing sneaky shit and bitches at every little thing possible and its very hard to respect her.
Just wondering how your relationship with your mom is, and how can I fix mine.

item.title: Mother
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

`SJ_:

Always respect your mother no matter what. They will always love you, and they do deserve respect no matter what the situation is.

I love my mother, but I don’t like the type of person she is. There is nothing that says I have to respect anyone, She’s the type of person that I personally don’t like to talk to. I talk to her because I obviously have to, but she can’t accept that I am who I am, she thinks everyone should look like this and do this and follow this religion, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Mother
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“tL, post:16, topic:447689”][quote author=Frell link=topic=550578.msg4035693#msg4035693 date=1341183273]
bblah
[/quote]

How is it any different than college?

You don’t say “I’m going to a college”.

University is a level of education. College is a level of education. You’re going to participate in that level of education, I’m going to university. Just like I’m going to high school, I’m going to secondary school, etc.

Always respect your mother no matter what. They will always love you, and they do deserve respect no matter what the situation is.

Always? No. In both cases you used the word, the first being linked to the second. You’re implying a mother can do no wrong.[/quote]

Actually here in redneck land you can say “Im going to an out of state college/university”

Read full topic

item.title: Mother
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

D: Meant to say how did I imply a mother can do no wrong.

Nobody is perfect, everybody has their own faults but yet, they still deserve the same amount of respect as anybody else. But you win

Read full topic

item.title: Mother
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote="`SJ_, post:19, topic:447689"]Disregarding my fetish for using always;

Your mother should always be respected. And how did I imply your mother can do no wrong…?[/quote]

There, you did it again. By saying your mother should always be respected. Not if she has done something that doesn’t deserve respect!

Read full topic

i am looking the purple coloured armour that is sitting in the centre of the room whilst sipping tea thinking about going to university.[/quote]

item.title: Mother
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:

Always respect your mother no matter what. They will always love you, and they do deserve respect no matter what the situation is.

Always? No. In both cases you used the word, the first being linked to the second. You’re implying a mother can do no wrong.[/quote]

Your mother should always be respected. And how did I imply a mother can do no wrong…?

item.title: Mother
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Frell:

Im going to a university

I’m going to high school. > I’m going to a high school

I’m going to middle school. > I’m going to a middle school

I’m going to kindergarten. > I’m going to a kindergarten.

It’s just how things go.

Read full topic

How is it any different than college?

You don’t say “I’m going to a college”.

University is a level of education. College is a level of education. You’re going to participate in that level of education, I’m going to university. Just like I’m going to high school, I’m going to secondary school, etc.

`SJ_:

Always respect your mother no matter what. They will always love you, and they do deserve respect no matter what the situation is.

item.title: Mother
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Im going to a university

Im going to college

Im going to university?

to university???

wat

University is like “store”

You would say im going to Walmart

You wouldn’t say im going to store

You could say im going to a store

Im going to a university

NOT IM GOING TO UNIVERSITY

IM GOING TO STORE

IM GOING TO BUILDING

IM GOING TO RESTAURANT

NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO YOUREEE ALL WRONNGGG COLOR NOT COLOURS DIPSHITSSSSSSSSSSS

Read full topic

item.title: Mother
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

why do you guys say university and thats it...

I don’t even know what this means…

Split up and give it up some grammar. I really can’t decode what you mean by ‘and thats it’.

Read full topic

item.title: Mother
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:

[quote=“Frell, post:11, topic:447689”][quote author=t4 link=topic=550578.msg4035334#msg4035334 date=1341157353]
time and space heals all wounds - simply wait until you go to uni (and hopefully live there), things will get better.
[/quote]

why do you guys say university and thats it…


you guys?
